desc.p: This method is used to get the geocache codes for the caches that are on the list.

req.name: list_id
req.p: The id of a list. List IDs can be obtained by ::service/lists/query

returns.p: A dictionary of the following structure:

ul.li: cache_codes - A pipe separated string of cache_codes that are on the list
cache_count - the number of geocaches on the list
